meanings.sent1: The toy car was tradable for a shiny marble.
meanings.sent2: Gold is a tradable commodity in the market.
meanings.sent3: The tradable banana peel caused a silly slip on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as tradable as a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The tradable ticket granted access to the exclusive event.

meanings.sent1: Fresh produce is tradable at the local market.
meanings.sent2: The antique vase was considered a highly tradable item.
meanings.sent3: The tradable joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His words were as tradable as currency in a negotiation.
meanings.sent5: The tradable skills of the team made them valuable assets.
